title: NVIDIA Blackwell GPUs
summary: NVIDIA announces its Blackwell architecture (B100/B200) aimed at next-gen AI training and inference.
market_analysis: Hyperscalers accelerate data-center CAPEX and pre-order Blackwell systems; NVIDIA's valuation tops $2T as AI server demand surges.

title: Apple Vision Pro Launch
summary: Apple ships its first spatial computing headset, Vision Pro, to consumers in the United States.
market_analysis: Kickstarts premium AR/VR spending; catalyzes spatial app development and lifts suppliers of micro-OLED displays and 3D sensors.

title: OpenAI Sora Text-to-Video
summary: OpenAI unveils Sora, generating high-fidelity videos directly from text prompts.
market_analysis: AI video enters production pipelines; advertisers and studios pilot synthetic content while cloud GPU demand and copyright debates intensify.

title: Google Gemini Long-Context Release
summary: Google rolls out Gemini 1.5 with million-token context and stronger multimodal reasoning across Workspace and Bard.
market_analysis: Raises expectations for long-context AI; prompts enterprises to test Gemini Advanced and heats competition with OpenAI and Anthropic.

title: ChatGPT Launch
summary: OpenAI releases ChatGPT, sparking AI revolution.
market_analysis: Tech stocks surge; AI investments hit $50B globally.

title: World Wide Web
summary: Tim Berners-Lee invents the World Wide Web.
market_analysis: Dot-com boom; internet economy reaches trillions.

title: Transistor Invention
summary: Bell Labs invents the transistor, replacing vacuum tubes.

title: Bessemer Process
summary: First inexpensive industrial process for mass-production of steel.
market_analysis: Steel prices dropped 80%, enabling skyscrapers and railroads. Carnegie Steel boom.

title: Voltaic Pile
summary: Alessandro Volta invents the first true electric battery.
market_analysis: Precursor to all modern electronics energy storage sectors.
